lang.diamonds_hint: Each time you ding level 3 - you get extra Diamond
lang.diamonds_buy: You can buy more Diamonds here
lang.fit_all_cards_hint: If you have more cards than the screen width - they will overlap
lang.dmgOnce: additional damage for next Attack once
lang.custom_class_type_card_colors: Tap to change this type of card color to a random. Tap to revert.
lang.cloud_input_hint: Login - 6 chars min, abc and numbers. PIN - 4 numbers. LOAD - get saves from cloud. SYNC - upload saves to cloud. Use this to transfer saves across your devices. Public logins may be removed.
lang.cloud_replace_tip: Cloud will replace your save on device. Are you sure you want it?
lang.cloud_auto_save_hint: Saves the game each time you at Map screen
lang.cloud_auto_load_hint: Loads data from cloud each time you launching the Game
lang.addDmgByCard: Deals +DMG additional damage for all your cards containing 'VAL' (TOTAL)
lang.dmgByEnemiesCount: Deals +DMG additional damage for each enemy
lang.act4_is_locked: You have to beat the first 3 acts with 3 different Heroes
lang.act4_is_unlocked: Act 4 is unlocked for all Heroes
lang.ctype_hint: Can be Attack(1), Skill(2), Power(3), Status(4), Curse(5)
lang.hiddentreasure: You are VAL% more likely to find treasure in ? rooms
lang.enjoing_review: Would you like to rate or leave a review, to let me know how it's going?
lang.question_restart: Are you sure you want to restart this save?
lang.quit_game: Are you sure want to quit?
lang.login_hpmax: Raise your Max HP by VAL
lang.one_of_the_skulls_stuck: One of the Skulls stuck in Door
lang.rest_sleep_hint: Heal for 30% of your Max HP(VAL)
lang.rest_smith_hint: Upgrade a card in your Deck
lang.rest_extra: At rest sites you can now gain
lang.relic_names_hint: Items Names - Defined by action OR look
lang.energysave_hint: Energy is now conserved between turns
lang.to_minhp: to the enemy with the least HP
lang.relicstoheal: Get the option to rest instead of picking a relic
lang.poison_hint: At the start of turn, Target loses HP and loses a point of Poison
lang.charm_hint: Increases damage taken per point. Each turn reduced by 1
lang.rebound_hint: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile
lang.lifelink_hint: On its second turn after its death, revives with 50% HP if fight is not finished
lang.drawUntilX: Draw cards until you have VAL in hand
lang.cheapretainer_hint: Whenever a card is Retained, lower its cost by VAL
lang.mantra_hint: When you obtain 10 Mantra - you will enter Divinity
lang.if_draw_card: If the card is a TYPE
lang.ifTargetHpLessEx: If target HP is at or below VAL
lang.ifTargetHpLess: If HP is at or below VAL%
lang.ifTargetHpMore: If HP is at or above VAL%
lang.ifTargetCONequalVAL: If target got CON equals to VAL
lang.ifTargetHaveMoreCONThenVAL: If target have CON more than VAL
lang.ifTargetIntend_dmg: If an enemy intends to attack
lang.ifSelfPlayedLast: If the previous card played was CTYPE
lang.ifSelfCONequalVAL: If you got CON equals to VAL
lang.missing_hp_to_dmg: Deal damage equal to missing HP
lang.missing_hp_to_attr: Gives VAL% of missing HP as ATTR
lang.peekX: Look at the top VAL cards of your draw pile (You may discard any of them)
lang.chooseOneRandom3: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile
lang.summons_hint: Summoning a Pet adds it into your first empty Slot
lang.evoke_hint: Your Pet get Evoked by oversummoning or by special Cards
lang.evokeX: Evoke your next Pet VAL times
lang.evokeReSummon: Summon the Pet that was just Evoked
lang.evokePassive1: Trigger the passive ability of right-most Pet once
lang.evokePassiveX: Trigger the passive ability of right-most Pet VAL times
lang.lockon_hint: Pets deal 50% more damage to this target
lang.easyenemies: Enemies in your first VAL combats will have 1 HP
lang.colorblind: You can find and use Cards from any deck
lang.exhaust_hint: Removes the card from the active deck until the end of combat
lang.ethereal_hint: This card will Exhaust itself in your hand at the end of turn
lang.innate_hint: Always begin combat with this card in your hand
lang.healing_hint: Healing is more effective during Combat
lang.consume_pain_txt: Consume XXX points of pain to get 1 ATTR
lang.curse_add_txt: For each Curse in your deck get 1 additional ATTR
lang.entangled_hint: Unable to use any Attack cards for 1 turn
lang.silenceskills_hint: Unable to use any Skills cards for 1 turn
lang.extrax_hint: Whenever you play a cost X card, its effects are increased by VAL
lang.cardsreward: You get VAL card choice to pick from
lang.deckToDmg1: Deal 1 DMG for each card in your draw pile
lang.drawToDmg1: Deal 1 DMG for each card in your discard pile
lang.armorFromDraw: Gain Armor equal to the number of cards in your discard pile
lang.deckToEnergy: Gain 1 Energy for every VAL cards in your draw pile
lang.event_shuffle: Every time you shuffle your deck
lang.event_cardNone1_rnd_txt: Obtain a random common colorless Card
lang.event_cardNone2_rnd_txt: Obtain a random uncommon colorless Card
lang.event_cardNone3_rnd_txt: Obtain a random rare colorless Card
lang.emptychest: The next non-boss relic Chest you open is empty
lang.ruled_harmed_hint: Have to be 'Harmed' to play this card
lang.event_search_txt: VAL% the monster returns. Gain a random remaining reward.
lang.event_removecard_rnd_txt: Remove random card in your deck
lang.event_removecard_1_txt: Remove a card in your deck
lang.event_removecard_2_txt: Remove two cards in your deck
lang.event_transform_1_txt: Transform a card in your deck
lang.event_transform_2_txt: Transform two cards in your deck
lang.event_upgrade_1_txt: Upgrade a card in your deck
lang.event_upgrade_2_txt: Upgrade two cards in your deck
lang.event_dublicate_1_txt: Duplicate a card in your deck
lang.event_turnEnd: At the end of each Turn
lang.event_played_ctype1_x3: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn
lang.event_played_ctype2_x3: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn
lang.event_played_cards_5: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn
lang.event_played_not_1: Every time you play not Attack card
lang.event_battlefervor: When got a stack of BF
lang.event_enemy_played_any: Whenever an enemy played a card
lang.event_enemy_played_1: Whenever an enemy played an Attack
lang.event_enemy_played_2: Whenever an enemy played a Skill
lang.event_enemy_played_3: Whenever an enemy played a Power
lang.event_samecardinhand: If you have duplicates in your hand
lang.onlyKeepZero: Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0
lang.onKillHint_true: If this kills an enemy, change permanently this card: PRMS
lang.onKillHint_false: If this kills an enemy, change for battle this card: PRMS
lang.drawPlayExhaust1: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it
lang.transfer_kill_rnd: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any CONDITION it has to a random enemy
lang.transfer_kill_enemies: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any CONDITION it has to all enemies
lang.exhaust_fail: VAL% chance of not exhausting a card, going to the discard pile instead
lang.vamp_hint: Heal HP equal to unblocked damage
lang.vamparmor_hint: Gain Armor equal to unblocked damage
lang.getAddDmgByAttr_handctype1: Deals an additional +VAL damage for every Attack in hand
lang.leacharmor_hint: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain Armor
lang.stance_hint: You can have one Stance at the time
lang.strX_hint: Strength affects this Attack X times
lang.times_hint: How many times this effect/attack is done
lang.preventdmg1: Prevent the next 1 time you would lose HP
lang.preventdmg2: Prevent the next 2 times you would lose HP
lang.strAddOnce: Add VAL Strength for one turn
lang.strRmvOnce: Lose VAL Strength for one turn
lang.dex_hint: Increases the Armor gained by 1 for each stack of Dexterity
lang.vulnerable_hint: Vulnerable target take 50% more damage from Attacks
lang.weak_hint: All attack damage dealt by a weakened entity is reduced by 25%
lang.frail_hint: Reduces the amount of Armor gained by 25%
lang.revive_hint: When you would die, heal to VAL (works once)
lang.shield_hint: Gain VAL Armor (Whenever you take unblocked damage, lose one stack)
lang.lives_hint: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once)
lang.resthealper5cards: Whenever you enter a Rest Site - for every 5 cards in your deck heal
lang.noresttrue: You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites
lang.nosmithtrue: You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites
lang.treasureextrarelic: The next VAL relic chests you open contain 2 Relics
lang.refund_card: Gain Energy equal to its cost
lang.sandbox_hint: Allows you to build your deck and gain the items you want
lang.ascend_helping_hand: You are missing a Skull Key. Would you like to proceed?
lang.blur_hint: Armor is not removed at the start of your next turn
lang.drawless_hint: draw 1 less card next VAL turn(s)
lang.frozen_hint: You cannot draw any cards this turn
lang.shift_hint: After taking VAL damage, shifts to a special mode
lang.intangible_hint: Reduces all damage and HP loss you take to 1
lang.wrath_hint: Within this stance, deal and receive double damage
lang.calm_hint: Upon exiting this stance, gain two Energy
lang.retain_hint: Keep card in your hand after the end of turn
lang.enlightenment_hint: Reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 1 for VAL turns
lang.sadistic_hint: Whenever you apply a Debuff to an enemy, they take DMG damage
lang.corruption_hint: Skill cards costs 0. Whenever you play a Skill, Exhausts it.
lang.candleblue_hint: Curse cards can now be played. Lose 1 hp and Exhausts the card
lang.candlered_hint: Status cards can now be played. Exhausts the card
lang.hand_exhaust_1_false: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand
lang.hand_exhaust_4_true: Exhaust all Status cards in your hand
lang.hand_discard_1_false: Discard all non-Attack cards in your hand
lang.doubletap1: This turn, your next Attack is played twice
lang.doubletap2: This turn, your next 2 Attacks are played twice
lang.doubleskill1: This turn, your next Skill is played twice
lang.doubleskill2: This turn, your next 2 Skills are played twice
lang.doublepower1: This turn, your next Power is played twice
lang.doublepower2: This turn, your next 2 Powers are played twice
lang.doubleplay1: The first card you play is played twice
lang.doubleheavytap1: The first Attack that costs 2 or more is played twice
lang.restheal: Heal an additional VAL HP when you rest
lang.hiddennoenemies_hint: Regular enemies are no longer encountered in ? rooms
lang.forge_hint_rename: Touch the Card to rename it
lang.forgerest: Now you can use Forge at Rest sites and rest at Forge
lang.item_rarity0_hint: Heroes can start with these items.
lang.item_rarity1_hint: Weak items that are found commonly.
lang.item_rarity2_hint: Stronger items which appear less often.
lang.item_rarity4_hint: Items found only within Boss chests.
lang.item_rarity5_hint: Items which can only be obtained through events.
lang.item_rarity6_hint: Can only be purchased from the Merchant.
lang.poisonadd: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional VAL Poison
lang.skull_key: The purpose of this Skull is unknown
lang.tutorial_rbq_1: Defeat enemies by playing cards from your hand!%e%eCards require %y%Energy%y% to play.%eOnce you are out, end your turn.%e%eAt the start of your turn, new cards are drawn and your %y%Energy%y% is replenished.
lang.tutorial_rbq_2: Play defensive cards to gain %b%Armor%b% when enemies are about to attack you.%e%e%b%Armor%b% reduces incoming attack damage but %r%wears off%r% at the start of next turn.
lang.tutorial_rbq_3: During your turn, you can observe an enemy's %y%Intent%y% above them.%e%eIf an enemy is intent on attacking you, be sure to gain some %b%Armor%b%!
lang.tutorial_rbq_welcome_1: Welcome your Majesty! Touch this bubble box to continue.
lang.tutorial_rbq_welcome_2: With whom you wanna play today? You can choose any hero to adventure forth.
lang.tutorial_rbq_undecidedloot_1: Your Majesty! You have unclaimed loot. Touch this bubble box to continue.
lang.tutorial_rbq_undecidedloot_2: You can postpone picking it up. But only within this Act.
lang.tutorial_rbq_fitallcards_1: Your Majesty! Looks like your hands are full.
lang.tutorial_rbq_fitallcards_2: You can swipe right or left to scroll your cards.
lang.tutorial_rbq_fitallcards_3: Or you can turn on 'Fit All Cards' option.
lang.ignorebattlefervor: For this turn you not getting more BF
lang.ignoreHarm_hint: You do not Harm yourself for one Turn
lang.ignoredmg: For this turn target can not do Damage
lang.dmgByAttrFromSource: Deal damage equal to your VAL
lang.dmgByAttrFromSourceTimes: Deal damage equal to your VAL xTIMES times
lang.unlimited_hint: Can be upgraded any number of times
lang.autoupgradeattacks: Whenever you add an Attack - it is Upgraded
lang.autoupgradeskills: Whenever you add a Skill - it is Upgraded
lang.autoupgradepowers: Whenever you add a Power - it is Upgraded
lang.removeatrest: You can now remove cards at Rest Site
lang.dmg_true_hint: True damage ignores Armor and Weak status
lang.copy_this_to_hand: Place a copy of this card into your hand
lang.copy_this_to_draw: Place a copy of this card into your discard pile
lang.change_all_tag_claw_true_all: All Claw cards deal 2 additional damage this combat
lang.change_hand_ctype_all_false_rnd: Change a random card in your hand
lang.change_hand_ctype_all_false_all: Change all cards in your hand
lang.change_energy: costs 0 for the rest of combat
lang.change_deck_ctype_1_true_1: Choose an Attack card: at the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand
lang.change_deck_ctype_2_true_1: Choose a Skill card: at the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand
lang.change_deck_ctype_3_true_1: Choose a Power card: at the start of each combat, this card will be in your hand
lang.redeck_draw_ctype_all_false: Place a card from your Discard pile on top of your Draw pile
lang.redeck_hand_ctype_all_false: Place a card from your Hand pile on top of your Draw pile
lang.rehand_trash_ctype_all_false: Place a card from your Exhausted pile to your hand
lang.rehand_trash_ctype_all_false_rnd: Place random card from your Exhausted pile to your hand
lang.rehand_deck_ctype_1_true: Choose an Attack from your draw pile and place it into your hand
lang.rehand_deck_ctype_2_true: Choose a Skill from your draw pile and place it into your hand
lang.rehand_draw_energy_0_true_all: Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand
lang.rehand_draw_ctype_all_false: Return a Card from your discard pile to your hand
lang.rehand_draw_ctype_all_false_2: Return 2 Cards from your discard pile to your hand
lang.rehand_draw_label_marked_true_all: returns all Marked cards from the Discard Pile into your Hand
lang.rehand_deck_ctype_all_false: Choose a Card from your draw pile and place it into your hand
lang.rehand_deck_ctype_all_false_2: Choose 2 Cards from your draw pile and place them into your hand
lang.redeck_this_to_deck: Shuffle this Card to Draw Pile
lang.redeck_trash_ctype_all_false_rnd: Place random card from your Exhausted pile to your Draw pile
lang.create_class_none_x1: Add a random colorless card to your hand
lang.create_class_none_x2: Add 2 random colorless cards to your hand
lang.create_class_hero_x1: Add a random card to your hand
lang.create_ctype_1_x1: Add a random Attack card to your hand
lang.create_ctype_2_x1: Add a random Skill card to your hand
lang.create_ctype_2_x2: Add 2 random Skill cards to your hand
lang.create_ctype_3_x1: Add 1 random Power card to your hand
lang.create_rarity_1_x1: Add a random Common card into your hand
lang.create_ctype_1_x3_classAll_pickX: Choose PICK of 3 Attacks of any color to add to your hand
lang.copy_hand_ctype_2_false: Create a copy of a non-Skill card in your hand
lang.copy_hand_ctype_2_false_x2: Create two copies of a non-Skill card in your hand
lang.copy_hand_ctype_all_false_nextTurn_x3: Choose a card. Next turn, add 3 copies of that card into your hand.
lang.money_heals: Whenever you gain Gold, heal VAL HP
lang.shop_remove_card_hint: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold
lang.curses_negated: Negate the next VAL Curses you obtain
lang.cardonbattle_hint: Normal enemies drop an additional card reward
lang.cardontreasure_hint: Treasure rooms now also contain cards
lang.wristblade_hint: Attacks that cost 0 deal VAL additional damage
lang.feed_hint: If it kills, will grant max HP
lang.corpseexplosion_hint: When the enemy dies, deal damage equal to its max HP to all enemies
lang.spike_hint: Whenever you are attacked, deal VAL damage to the attacker
lang.retaincards_hint: At the end of your turn, Retain up to VAL card
lang.extra_demon_hint: She can take advantage of her Pain
lang.extra_blood_mage_hint: Battle Fever(BF) - it consumed every turn to heal.
lang.discard_all_ctype_all_false_all: Shuffle all your cards into your draw pile
lang.discount_by_discard: Cost 1 less for each discarded card this turn
lang.discount_by_attacked: Cost 1 less for each time you take damage
lang.discount_by_played_ctype3: Costs 1 less Energy for each Power card played this combat
lang.exhaust_hand_ctype_all_false_rnd: Exhaust a random card in your hand
lang.exhaust_hand_ctype_all_false: Exhaust a card in your hand
lang.exhaust_hand_ctype_4_true_rnd: Exhaust a random Status in your hand
lang.exhaust_deck_ctype_all_false_play2: Exhaust a card in draw pile, play it twice
lang.upgrade_hand_ctype_all_false: Upgrade a card in your hand for this combat
lang.upgrade_hand_ctype_all_false_all: Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for this combat
lang.upgrade_hand_ctype_all_false_rnd: Upgrade a random card in your hand
lang.upgrade_all_ctype_all_false_all: Upgrade ALL cards for this combat
lang.upgrade_all_ctype_1_true_all: Upgrade all Attack cards for this combat
lang.upgrade_permanent_ctype_all_false_rnd: Upgrade a random card in your deck
lang.upgradenewtempcards_hint: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it
lang.rewriteOnUseActionrehand: Whenever you manipulate this card, add it into your hand instead
lang.hero_frontier_hint: Warrior Templar - Imbued with the fire of the sun. Her skin shimmers with starfire while her eyes burn with the power of the celestial Aspect within her.
lang.hero_miss_fortune_hint: A Bilgewater captain famed for her looks but feared for her ruthlessness.
lang.hero_shiva_hint: A Jinn that was sealed away in the snowy drifts of Lanzelt, with features fair and a heart as cold as a winter's night.
lang.hero_sila_hint: Supernatural creature. A talented shapeshifters often appearing in human form and female. Accordingly they are said to seduce men.
lang.hero_demon_hint: She left Adam and refused to return to the Garden of Eden. She may take a form of a beautiful girl but closer inspection may reveal bird-like claws and serpentine tails.
lang.hero_blood_mage_hint: Employ dark rites in order to access more powerful magic. She must be willing to sacrifice their own life force in order to wield this power.
lang.hero_shaman_hint: Once performed spirit possession in their service to shrines. As time passed, she left the shrines and began working independently.
lang.hero_monkey_queen_hint: Powerful being born from stone. Able to shapeshift, create clones from her hair, cloud walking and a magic staff.
lang.rule_attack_hand_hint: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack
lang.rule_only_attack_hint: Can only be played if this is the only Attack in your hand
lang.rule_lastcard_hint: Can only be played if there are no other cards in your hand
lang.turntrue: At the end of a turn
lang.turnfalse: At the start of each turn
lang.potion_slot_hint: Use potions during combat to gain bonuses or hinder enemies
lang.freecast_hint: The next Card you play costs 0
lang.freeattack_hint: The next Attack you play costs 0
lang.onConditions_add_voodoo_true: Add VAL power to each Doll
lang.dollofdecay_hint: Random Enemy loses Strength for one turn
lang.scroll_getting_hint: Every Mage will leave a scroll if fired
lang.amulet_6: Fire Amulet of the Magic Hunter
lang.amulet_7: Water Amulet of the Magic Hunter
lang.amulet_8: Earth Amulet of the Magic Hunter
lang.amulet_9: Air Amulet of the Magic Hunter
lang.amulet10: Void Amulet of the Magic Hunter
lang.barbarian_hint: Uses brute strength and raw fury to excel in combat
lang.bastard_hint: Uses brute strength and raw fury to excel in combat
lang.amazon_hint: Fierce merciless warriors of the rainforest.
lang.pirate_hint: Always looking for Treasure. One shot and charge!
lang.knightsword_hint: Follower of a fire cult, master of swords
lang.succubus_hint: Energy vampire - will leave no drop
lang.warrior_defender_hint: He wears armor infused with gold.
lang.paladin_hint: A holy knight, crusading in the name of good and order.
lang.dwarrior_hint: Dark warrior that follows a path of pure Evil. AoE damage.
lang.dwarriorshadow_hint: Dark knights who have faith in pure Evil. AoE damage.
lang.highelf_hint: Guardians of the forest, masters of the spear.
lang.knightarcher_hint: Armored archer equipped with a composite bow, seeking the Phoenix.
lang.gnom_hint: Dwarves wield devastating hammers and do not fear magic.
lang.gnome_trooper_hint: Dwarves wield devastating hammers and do not fear magic.
lang.gnome_range_hint: A stubborn bunch, preferring to trust their own eyes.
lang.gnome_shooter_hint: A stubborn bunch, preferring to trust their own eyes.
lang.gnome_axe_hint: Are the most experienced of the Dwarf warriors, a fact evidenced by their long beards.
lang.gnome_mage_hint: The spiritual and political leader of dwarves, the Thane is its ultimate power.
lang.gnome_rifle_hint: Methodical, they will simply keep on loading and firing in a disciplined manner.
lang.gnome_sekira_hint: For every battle they fight on the surface they have faced dozens below the ground.
lang.bigsmith_hint: Outcast everywhere - Redbeard is tough, smashing problems with his enormous weapon.
lang.goblin_sword_hint: Simple, life-loving goblin with a sword.
lang.goblin_swords_hint: This one found a second sword. Why not swing both at once?
lang.goblin_sniper_hint: Sneaky, but very deadly in groups.
lang.witch_hint: Wicked old women who have wrinkled skin, pimples, and pointy hats.
lang.energymax: +VAL Energy at the start of each turn
lang.blinded_hint: You can no longer see enemy Intents
lang.potionless_hint: You can no longer obtain potions
lang.confuse_hint: Whenever you draw a card, randomize it's cost
lang.renekton_hint: Green of plumage, with alert face and raised fore.
lang.azir_hint: The sky god controls the sun and the moon.
lang.goblin_warrior_hint: Born and raised to fight till death.
lang.goblin_shield_hint: Born and raised to shrug off massive punishment.
lang.goblin_shaman_hint: A leader of goblins. He can cast powerful spells.
lang.goblin_elder_hint: An elder shaman. He can cast powerful spells.
lang.mingmage_hint: His look will enfeeble, while his touch can freeze your heart.
lang.tax_collector_hint: Pillar of an empire. Collects taxes from nearby houses.
lang.mag_blue_hint: Holy mages, that can heal the living and strike down the undead.
lang.mag_red_hint: Red mages who love to play with fire.
lang.mag_black_hint: Rumors tell that they have looked upon the very face of death.
lang.ranger_hint: Sleek looking individuals who primarily use bows.
lang.archer_hint: Sleek looking individuals who primarily use bows.
lang.elf_hint: The Elves have slim and nimble bodies, and study the way of the bow from a young age.
lang.genie_hint: Made of a smokeless and scorching fire. This one is on your side.
lang.giant_rat_hint: They are too big to be let go. Rats go crazy when provoked.
lang.skelet_hint: Soulless warriors that resist arrow attacks.
lang.skeletarcher_hint: Soulless archers that use their own bones as ammo.
lang.skeletwarrior_hint: He used to be a great knight before he took an arrow to the knee.
lang.dragonheads3_hint: Has poisonous breath and blood so virulent that even its scent was deadly
lang.zombe_hint: An animated corpse raised by witchcraft.
lang.medusa_hint: A hideous woman with venomous snakes in place of hair.
lang.garpy_hint: Shrill flying creatures that hunt local villagers for sport.
lang.spider_hint: Poisonous spiders that prey on weak humans.
lang.skeletmage_hint: A once-great mage, before being slain by a barbarian
lang.mermaid_hint: Aquatic beauty that swings her trident like a pro.
lang.goblin_axe_hint: The only thing they enjoy more than swinging axes is the screaming that follows.
lang.golem_hint: Big stone giant. To slow to understand foe from ally.
lang.sandspear_hint: Spirit of a desert warrior, defending his master.
lang.sandpriest_hint: Spirit of a desert priest, defending his master.
lang.ent_hint: Big living tree. Harmless while sleeping, deadly if awakened.
lang.veigar_hint: Used to be small and cute, but an old curse turned him into Japan's worst nightmare.
lang.orc_hint: These soldiers are the fodder for the orc hordes.
lang.orc_heavy_hint: Every 10th Orc is stronger then the others - beware!
lang.orc_beast_hint: Green Beast created by corrupted elven magic.
lang.airgolem_hint: Pure air sealed by magic to walk amongst the living
lang.vampire_hint: Very old undead that seeks fresh blood to keep him alive
lang.vampire_violet_hint: Member of a royal society that seeks the freshest blood.
lang.vampire_red_hint: Leader of a royal society that seeks the freshest blood.
lang.mag_evil_hint: Half-dead mage who almost discovered the spell of eternal life.
lang.elf_evil_hint: This elf comes out only at night to stalk prey.
lang.highelf_evil_hint: This elf comes out only at night to stalk prey.
lang.minotaur_hint: Giant with the head of a bull on the body of a man.
lang.trol_hint: Giant green beast. A very lonely creature that lives under bridges.
